fixes.name: Profit RAG
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR ProfitSum = SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit])
RETURN
SWITCH(
    TRUE(),
    ProfitSum < 60000, 1,
    ProfitSum >= 60000 && ProfitSum <= 80000, 2,
    3
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau IF with SUM([Profit]) comparisons by a DAX measure using VAR to capture SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit]) and SWITCH(TRUE()) for conditional logic. All column references were converted to the 'Table'[Column] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
